title: Group Therapy: She Wants to Be on the Deed
description: Blake calls about an issue he's dealing with with his girlfriend.  He's buying a house and is putting all the money down on it and his girlfriend is planning on living with him.  She wants her name on the deed but Blake went through a divorce and lost a lot in that process so he doesn't want to have her on the deed.  What should he do?
itunes:summary: Blake calls about an issue he's dealing with with his girlfriend.  He's buying a house and is putting all the money down on it and his girlfriend is planning on living with him.  She wants her name on the deed but Blake went through a divorce and lost a lot in that process so he doesn't want to have her on the deed.  What should he do?
